verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Say, “He is God, One and only.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: Say, “He is Allah, One and only.

verses.verseString: He neither begets nor is He begotten.
And there is none comparable or equivalent to Him.”
